title: ProMod - Mount & Blade : Warband
description:
This is an experimental multiplayer-oriented mod for Warband developed out of my determination to see a polished Warband multiplayer.

As stated in the name, one focus of this mod is progression, and ultimately balance, through class stats and items. This mod was not made to see Native multiplayer how I want to see it, but rather every decision and change was done with great thought and care as well as complete objectivity.
Another focus of this mod was to keep things Native. It uses 90% Native assets and textures. Supplements were introduced where necessary, and I did my best to make them fit in with the look and feel of Native.
